text: Otodontidae is an extinct family of mackreel sharks that lived in Cretaceous to Pleistocene. The more famous species of the family is the Megalodon. The genus inclued disputed genus, the Parotodus from example. The family inclued others extinct genus as the Megalolamna and the dubious Megaselachus. == References == Category:Sharks Category:Miocene Category:Eocene
title: Otodontidae
